game: Bizhawk client w/ Universal Tracker integration

BizhawkUT_1.0.0.description:
Integrates Universal Tracker support in the Bizhawk client.
Compatible with Universal Tracker v0.1.15.1

Setup:
- Put `bizhawk_ut.apworld` in `archipelago/custom_worlds` along with the Universal Tracker apworld.
BizhawkUT_1.0.0.title: Bizhawk client w/ Universal Tracker integration

BizhawkUT_1.1.0.description:
Integrates Universal Tracker support in the Bizhawk client.
Compatible with Universal Tracker v0.1.15.1 and Archipelago v0.5.1

## Changes:
- Will now be the default Bizhawk client when opening associated patch files. The normal Bizhawk client can still be opened directly.
- Shows Universal Tracker version in the window title

## Setup:
- Put `bizhawk_ut.apworld` in `archipelago/custom_worlds` along with the Universal Tracker apworld.
BizhawkUT_1.1.0.title: Bizhawk client w/ Universal Tracker integration 1.1.0

BizhawkUT_1.1.1.description:
Integrates Universal Tracker support in the Bizhawk client.
Compatible with Universal Tracker v0.1.15.1 and Archipelago v0.5.1

## Changes:
- Can now send checks (was connecting as a Tracker previously)

## Setup:
- Put bizhawk_ut.apworld in archipelago/custom_worlds along with the Universal Tracker apworld.
BizhawkUT_1.1.1.title: Bizhawk client w/ Universal Tracker integration 1.1.1

BizhawkUT_1.2.0.description:
Integrates Universal Tracker support in the Bizhawk client.
Compatible with Universal Tracker v0.2.7 and Archipelago v0.6.1

### Changes:
- Fixed error when opening patches on Archipelago v0.6.1
- Now tracks locally handled items (as of Universal Tracker v0.2.7)
BizhawkUT_1.2.0.title: Bizhawk client w/ Universal Tracker integration 1.2.0

BizhawkUT_1.3.0.description:
Integrates Universal Tracker support in the Bizhawk client.
Compatible with Universal Tracker v0.2.14 and Archipelago v0.6.3

### Changes:
- Updated to match changes to Universal Tracker
BizhawkUT_1.3.0.title: Bizhawk client w/ Universal Tracker integration 1.3.0

BizhawkUT_1.3.1.description:
Integrates Universal Tracker support in the Bizhawk client.
Compatible with Universal Tracker v0.2.22 and Archipelago v0.6.3

### Changes:

BizhawkUT_1.3.1.title: Bizhawk client w/ Universal Tracker integration 1.3.1
